title: strutR: Struthers Wetting-Front Model for Infiltration, Redistribution, and Drainage (R implementation)

creators.name: Martini, Tommaso
creators.affiliation: Department of Regional and Urban Studies and Planning (DIST), University of Turin (UniTo), Italy

description: Reference implementation in R of the multiple-wetting-front gravitational infiltration and redistribution model originally proposed by Struthers, Hinz, and Sivapalan (2006, Water Resources Research, 42(6), W06406). The package provides open-source functions for infiltration, redistribution, front merging, and drainage in one-dimensional unsaturated soils, with full documentation and example scripts.

related_identifiers.description: Original article describing the wetting-front model (Struthers, Hinz, & Sivapalan, 2006, Water Resources Research).
GitHub repository of the strutR R package.

notes: This record corresponds to the official versioned release of the R package 'strutR', which implements the wetting-front infiltration and redistribution model originally published by Struthers et al. (2006). The software provides a transparent and reproducible R translation of the conceptual model equations for educational and research use. A new DOI will be automatically minted by Zenodo upon each GitHub release and linked to this concept DOI.
